latestVersion.termsOfAccess:
Project files like raw data, coding guidelines and questionnaires can now be directly downloaded from this site.
Please see also SSD's Farm Household Survey Database (http://ricestat.irri.org/fhsd/).
latestVersion.dataAccessPlace: All files for this project/study, except for the Project Description, need to be directly downloaded from SSD's Farm Household Survey Database's online link: http://ricestat.irri.org/fhsd/

fields.value: Impact Assessment of Three Reductions  - Three Gains in South Vietnam

dsDescriptionValue.value: Measure awareness and adoption of 3R3G in the Mekong Delta Region and assess differences in input use, productivity, farm costs and incomes between adopters and non-adopters.

keywordValue.value: Standard input-output rice production variables for DS and WS; demographics; awareness, knowledge and perception variables regarding 3R3G, fertilizers, pesticides and seeds.

fields.value: Subject: Number of Repondents  Type: Sample Size  Notes: 596; Subject: 2005-2006  Type: 1.  Notes: Cantho and An Giang; Subject: 2006-2007  Type: 2.  Notes: Soc Trang;

value: Can Tho, An Giang, and Soc Trang provinces
